name: Dribbble : Dark Background + Sticky Header
description: Save a few lumens and focus on the shots. This style changes the background of Dribbble to a dark gray and forces the header to be sticky. A few other minor changes were made to improve the dark background experience.
additional_info: Change Log ver. 1.2 [06/04/13] Moved site notice banner below sticky header. Reduced width of shot color swatch to prevent line wrapping. ver. 1.1 [08/01/12] Added site specific declarations and meta data to code. This resolves the sticky header issue. Fixed background color issue with footer. (tested in Chrome 20.0.1132.57 m) ver. 1.0 [07/31/12] Original Release.
